caption.p: Clinical manifestations of TCM in different stages of COVID-19

tr.td: Cold-damp encumbering the lung: fever, hypodynamia, body aches, cough, expectoration, tight chest and breathless, anorexia, nausea, vomiting, loose stool, tongue bearing dental impressions or red, white fur, soggy pulse or slippery pulse

Damp-heat retention in lung: low fever, aversion to cold, hypodynamia, heavy cumbersome head and body, sore muscle, dry cough with little sputum, pharyngalgia, dry mouth, oppression in the chest, anhidrosis, anorexia, loose stool, red tongue, light-colored tongue with white and slippery coating, soggy pulse or slippery pulse

Pattern damp toxin brewing and binding: fever, cough, low phlegm or yellow phlegm, suffocating, abdominal distension, constipation, red tongue, fat tongue, yellow fur or dry, soggy pulse or slippery pulse

Pattern of cold-damp encumbering the lung: Low fever, hiding fever, dry cough, dry cough, scant phlegm, hypodynamia, oppression in chest, nausea and vomiting, loose stool, red tongue, light-colored tongue with white and slippery coating, soggy pulse

Pattern of epidemic toxin internal block: fever and blush, cough, phlegm yellow and sticky, blood in phlegm, shortness of breath, hypodynamia, dry mouth, bitter taste in mouth, nausea, constipation, yellow urine, red tongue, tongue yellow and greasy, slippery pulse

Pattern of qi and construction both ablaze: great heat and thirst, shortness of breath, delirium, blurred vision, or hematemesis, apostaxis, or convulsion of the limbs, no tongue coating, sunken pulse, thread pulse, floating pulse

Internal block and outward desertion: difficulty breathing, Shortness of breath or needing mechanical ventilation, dizziness, irritability, sweating and feeling cold, dark purple tongue, thick or dry tongue coating, floating pulse
Dual vacuity of the lung and spleen: shortness of breath, hypodynamia, poor appetite, glomus and fullness, constipation, loose stool, fat tongue, pale tongue

Pattern of dual vacuity of lung: weakness, shortness of breath, dry mouth, thirst, palpitations, sweaty, poor appetite, low fever, dry cough with less phlegm, dry tongue, thready pulse or feeble pulse
